issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: When one node removed from exclude file, and its state from decommission-in-progress to in service. But the underReplicatedBlocksNum of cluster has not been decreased. Most of these underReplicatedBlocks are not needed and it will costs namenode much time to deal with. And frequently namenode will find there are enough replications. So in {{stopDecommissioned}} operation, we should remove neededReplicatedBlocks of decomNodes.
fields.summary: StopDecommission for datanode should remove the underReplicatedBlocks
